Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 18, Rise of the Runelords Player's Guide pg. 11, Curse of the Crimson Throne Player's Guide pg. 13, Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 209, Inner Sea World Guide pg. 290, Adventurer's Armory pg. 18, Varisia, Birthplace of Legends pg. 14

[PFS] Statistics

Cost 12 gp Weight 6 lbs.

Damage 1d4 (small), 1d6 (medium); Critical x2; Range -; Type S; Special see text

Category One-Handed; Proficiency Martial

Weapon Groups Blades, Heavy; Close

Description

The traditional form of this tribal weapon is a short metal blade bound to the skull of a large horned lizard, but a skilled smith can craft one entirely out of metal. A traditional klar counts as a light wooden shield with armor spikes; a metal klar counts as a light steel shield with armor spikes. The klar's shield entry appears on page 12.
